newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales total $819 mln on Wednesday Nov 13.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales total $819 mln on Wednesday Nov 13.

text.p: Scheduled competitive and negotiated municipal bond sales are expected to total $819 million in 30 offerings for Wednesday Nov 13, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Competitive sales total $245 million in 18 offerings. The largest competitive issue is a $90 million Boston, Mass., general obligation issue at 1100 EST.
Negotiated sales total $573 million in 12 offerings. The largest issue is a $161 State of Connecticut issue through Merrill Lynch & Co.
There are seven issues totaling $123 million on the day-to-day calendar, which means dealers have indicated that the offerings may be brought to market.
